Akkasah: Photography Archive (NYU Abu Dhabi)
Shlomo Narinsky (Neroni) and Sonia Narinsky Postcard Album - Hisham Khatib Collection
Khatib, Hisham, Mr.
Narinsky, Shlomo
Narinsky, Sonia
Jamal Brothers, Jerusalem, Palestine
AD.MC.030_ref174 40
74 Photographic Prints 74 photogravures over 65 pages of an album. One newspaper clipping.
1910-1921 Generally good, some colour distortion. Electronic Records AD_MC_030_ref174
Content Description
Digital surrogates of 74 photogravures of Palestine taken between 1910-1921. Many include portraits of Palestinians, landscapes and reliious sites.
Photographic Prints Palestine Landscapes Archaeological Sites/Artifacts Postcards Khatib, Hisham, Mr.
